title: Breakfast Club Court, Sheila E, Interview and More
itunes:title: Breakfast Club Court, Sheila E, Interview and More
description:
Today on the Breakfast club, we got caught up on the latest tea involving Gucci Maine and Angela Yee. A rumor has been spread that Gucci Mane is banned from the show after his last visit when he claimed that Angela was into him a while back. We took it to the Breakfast Club Court to see who our listeners believed and whose side they're on. We also had legendary drummer and musician Sheila E. talk about her relationship with Prince as well as how she's healing from childhood trauma.  Also we asked our listeners to choose today's donkey of the day.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the Breakfast club, we got caught up on the latest tea involving Gucci Maine and Angela Yee. A rumor has been spread that Gucci Mane is banned from the show after his last visit when he claimed that Angela was into him a while back. We took it to the Breakfast Club Court to see who our listeners believed and whose side they're on. We also had legendary drummer and musician Sheila E. talk about her relationship with Prince as well as how she's healing from childhood trauma.  Also we asked our listeners to choose today's donkey of the day.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
